name: GLKFogMode
desc: A mode that describes how the fog component is calculated for the fragment.

items.name: case exp
items.desc: The fog component is calculated as exp(-density * distance) and clamped to the range [0.0, 1.0].

items.name: case exp2
items.desc: The fog component is calculated as exp(-(density * distance)^2) and clamped to the range [0.0, 1.0].

items.name: case linear
items.desc: The fog component is calculated as (end - distance) / (end - start) and clamped to the range [0.0, 1.0].
